name: Evil Mob Beach Invasion
description:
Entry for the I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again) Jam

Use your quack-magick to prevent the evil horde from reaching the beach and spoiling the water!

Featuring:

* Endless hordes of evil mobs.

* Awesome special effects and precise physics simulation.

* Fair and balanced upgrade system

* Not happy with the game balance? Tune it yourself using the built in customise menu

How to play 'Left-Click' to cast your Primary Spell
'Right-Click' to cast a more powerfull Secondary Spell
'Tab' to switch spell school.

'Escape' to access the upgrade Menu

Using a primary skill charges its secondary skill, allowing you to use it.
Using a primary skill charges up other primary skill, increasing theyr attack speed. So switch through spell school regulary to benefit from that.

Test the limits

Tell me how much your machine can handle, I am really interested in your numbers. How many enemies can be on the screen until your CPU gives up?
How many fireballs does it take for your GPU to die a heath death?

Screenshots are welcome :)
